concept.title: What is Subtraction of Numbers?
concept.shortdesc: Here you will learn, what is subtraction?

conbody.p: To successfully perform the task of subtracting numbers, you must know what is subtraction. The term 'subtraction' represents a mathemactical operation which allows you to find the difference between two numbers.
You can use the minus (-) button to express the subtraction operation in the app.
In the subtraction process, you take a number and reduce it to a smaller number. That's it, we take away one number from another.
